Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_HOR_FIELD (EWA_H_ID, EWA_F_ID, EWA_F_NAME, EWA_F_DES, EWA_F_TYPE, EWA_F_LENGTH, EWA_F_ORD, EWA_C_ID) VALUES ( @EWA_H_ID, @sys_unID, @EWA_F_NAME, @EWA_F_DES, @EWA_F_TYPE, @EWA_F_LENGTH, @EWA_F_ORD, @EWA_C_ID)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_HOR_FIELD SET EWA_F_NAME = @EWA_F_NAME, EWA_F_DES = @EWA_F_DES, EWA_F_TYPE = @EWA_F_TYPE, EWA_F_LENGTH = @EWA_F_LENGTH, EWA_F_ORD = @EWA_F_ORD WHERE EWA_F_ID = @EWA_F_ID

Set.DisplayList: ,短文本（200长度） STR,整形 INT,数字 NUM, 长文本 TXT, 日期型 DATE,二进制 BLOB

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: select * from ( SELECT _EWA_C_ID, _EWA_H_ID, _EWA_C_NAME, _EWA_C_PID, _EWA_C_LVL, _EWA_C_ORD FROM _EWA_HOR_CAT WHERE _EWA_H_ID=@_EWA_H_ID union select 'ALL','','-- ALL --','', 0, -100000 ) aa ORDER BY _EWA_C_LVL , _EWA_C_ORD

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_HOR_CAT(_EWA_C_PID, _EWA_C_NAME, _EWA_C_LVL, _EWA_C_ORD, _EWA_C_ID, _EWA_H_ID) SELECT @_EWA_C_PID, @_EWA_C_NAME, A.LVL, B.ORD, @SYS_UNID,@_EWA_H_ID FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(_EWA_C_LVL) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(_EWA_C_LVL) + 1 END LVL FROM _EWA_HOR_CAT WHERE _EWA_C_ID=@_EWA_C_PID ) A, ( SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(_EWA_C_ORD) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(_EWA_C_ORD) + 1 END ORD FROM _EWA_HOR_CAT WHERE _EWA_C_PID=@_EWA_C_PID ) B; SELECT * FROM _EWA_HOR_CAT WHERE _EWA_C_ID = @SYS_UNID

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_HOR_SQL WHERE 1=1 AND ( (@EWA_RECYCLE='1' AND EWA_SQL_STATUS ='DEL') OR (@EWA_RECYCLE IS NULL AND ( EWA_SQL_STATUS !='DEL' OR EWA_SQL_STATUS IS NULL)) )

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_HOR_SQL SET EWA_SQL_STATUS ='DEL' WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID AND EWA_SQL_NAME = @EWA_SQL_NAME

Set.Name: OnFrameRestore SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_HOR_SQL SET EWA_SQL_STATUS ='USED' WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID AND EWA_SQL_NAME = @EWA_SQL_NAME

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行/javascript_func() as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.SearchSql: SELECT EWA_H_ID, EWA_H_NAME FROM _EWA_HOR_MAIN ORDER BY EWA_H_NAME

Set.RefSql: SELECT EWA_H_ID, EWA_H_NAME FROM _EWA_HOR_MAIN ORDER BY EWA_H_NAME

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_HOR_SQL WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID AND EWA_SQL_NAME = @EWA_SQL_NAME

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_HOR_SQL (EWA_H_ID, EWA_SQL_NAME, EWA_SQL_MEMO, EWA_SQL_VIEW, EWA_F_IDS, EWA_SQL_STATUS) VALUES ( @EWA_H_ID, @EWA_SQL_NAME, @EWA_SQL_MEMO, @EWA_SQL_VIEW, @EWA_F_IDS, 'USED')

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_HOR_SQL SET EWA_SQL_MEMO = @EWA_SQL_MEMO, EWA_SQL_VIEW = @EWA_SQL_VIEW, EWA_F_IDS = @EWA_F_IDS WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID AND EWA_SQL_NAME = @EWA_SQL_NAME

Set.Name: CheckError SQL
Set.Sql: -- select 不能执行 as EWA_ERR_OUT FROM xxx where 1=2

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_HOR_MAIN (EWA_H_ID, EWA_H_NAME, EWA_H_TABLE, EWA_H_DES, EWA_H_PKS, EWA_H_SQL_SELECT, EWA_H_SQL_UPDATE, EWA_H_SQL_DELETE, EWA_H_CDATE) VALUES ( @sys_unID, @EWA_H_NAME, @EWA_H_TABLE, @EWA_H_DES, @EWA_H_PKS, @EWA_H_SQL_SELECT, @EWA_H_SQL_UPDATE, @EWA_H_SQL_DELETE, @sys_DATE)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_HOR_MAIN SET EWA_H_NAME = @EWA_H_NAME, EWA_H_TABLE = @EWA_H_TABLE, EWA_H_DES = @EWA_H_DES, EWA_H_PKS = @EWA_H_PKS, EWA_H_SQL_SELECT = @EWA_H_SQL_SELECT, EWA_H_SQL_UPDATE = @EWA_H_SQL_UPDATE, EWA_H_SQL_DELETE = @EWA_H_SQL_DELETE, EWA_H_MDATE = @sys_DATE WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID

Set.Top:
<script src="/EmpScriptV2/EWA_STYLE/js/EWA_COLOR_MARK.js"></script> <script src="/EmpScriptV2/EWA_DEFINE/js/EWAC_HorTableSql.js"></script>
<input type=button value='添加新纪录' onclick="addNew()" res='EWA.F.FOS["@SYS_FRAME_UNID"].Resources.butAdd.GetInfo()' />
<input type=button value='移动字段' onclick="move()" />

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT A.* FROM _EWA_HOR_FIELD A WHERE EWA_H_ID = @EWA_H_ID AND (A.EWA_C_ID = @EWA_C_Id OR ifnull(@EWA_C_Id, 'ALL') = 'ALL') ORDER BY EWA_C_ID, EWA_F_ORD

Set.Name: ExtendAction0 SQL
